properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REPLY WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE REPLY SET DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REPLY WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT R.REPLY_NO , R.RECIPE_NO , RC.RECIPE_TITLE , R.REPLY_CONTENT , R.MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN RECIPE RC ON RC.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY R.MODIFY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
